main event: Two circular discs, white in color, approximately 60 ft. in diameter, were observed at Ladd AFB, Alaska on 9 May 1950.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes before the objects accelerated rapidly to the west and disappeared., The objects were observed at around 1,000 ft. above ground., Witnesses included Lt. Brown and CPL. Fegley., The event was reported to the Director of Intelligence, USAF., The report was classified as unclassified.
sighted object: two circular discs in the sky
witness description: Lt. Brown, 0-728568 and CPL. Fegley, RA 16-215,837
